products.description: A concentrated coffee shot made with an espresso machine. Espresso can be made from any type of coffee bean, but there are special espresso roasts available.
A balanced blend of equal parts espresso, steamed milk, and milk foam. It’s creamy and frothy, often topped with cocoa or cinnamon.
Made by diluting a shot of espresso with hot water, resulting in a milder coffee with a similar strength to brewed coffee but a distinct espresso flavor.
Caffè latte, often shortened to just latte in English, is a coffee drink of Italian origin made with espresso and steamed milk, traditionally served in a glass.
Caffè macchiato, sometimes called espresso macchiato and often shortened to just macchiato in English, is an espresso coffee drink with a small amount of milk, usually foamed.
A flat white is a coffee drink consisting of espresso and steamed milk. It generally has a higher proportion of espresso to milk than a caffè latte, and lacks the thick layer of foam in a cappuccino.
